SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.controller

Class updatingTransactionStatusTest

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.controller.updatingTransactionStatusTest
@WebMvcTest(controllers=TransactionController.class, excludeAutoConfiguration=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.servlet.SecurityAutoConfiguration.class) public class updatingTransactionStatusTest extends Object
Unit tests for the updateTransactionStatus functionality in TransactionController. using black-box testing on the `/transaction/updatetransactionstatus` endpoint, verifying the behavior for various valid and invalid TID and status values.

  • Method Details

    • updateTransactionStatus_ValidTidStatusCompleted

      @Test public void updateTransactionStatus_ValidTidStatusCompleted() throws Exception
      Test case 1: Updating transaction status with a valid TID and status = "COMPLETED". Expects a 200 OK status if the transaction is updated successfully.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTranssactionStatus_ValidTidStatusPA

      @Test public void updateTranssactionStatus_ValidTidStatusPA() throws Exception
      Test case 2: Updating transaction status with a valid TID and status = "PENDING-ACCEPTANCE". Expects a 200 OK status if the transaction is updated successfully.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTranssactionStatus_ValidTidStatusIC

      @Test public void updateTranssactionStatus_ValidTidStatusIC() throws Exception
      Test case 3: Updating transaction status with a valid TID and status = "IN-CART". Expects a 200 OK status if the transaction is updated successfully.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTransactionStatus_InvalidTid

      @Test public void updateTransactionStatus_InvalidTid() throws Exception
      Test case 4: Attempting to update transaction status with an invalid TID format. Expects a 400 Bad Request status due to the invalid TID.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTransactionStatus_EmptyTid

      @Test public void updateTransactionStatus_EmptyTid() throws Exception
      Test case 5: Attempting to update transaction status with an empty TID. Expects a 400 Bad Request status due to the empty TID.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTransactionStatus_invalidStatus

      @Test public void updateTransactionStatus_invalidStatus() throws Exception
      Test case 6: Attempting to update transaction status with a valid TID but an invalid status. Expects a 400 Bad Request status due to the invalid status value.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly

    • updateTransactionStatus_NullTid

      @Test public void updateTransactionStatus_NullTid() throws Exception
      Test case 7: Attempting to update transaction status with a null TID and a valid status. Expects a 400 Bad Request status due to the null TID.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the request fails unexpectedly
